name: Sandro Botticelli
description:
Requirement: 10 wood 
Once Per Round ability: Gain 2 Military Points and 1 Victory Point.

name: Giovanni dalle Bande Nere
description:
Requirement: 12 Military Points 
Once Per Round ability: Receive 1 wood, 1 stone, and 1 coin.

name: Girolamo Savonarola
description:
Requirement: 18 coins 
Once Per Round ability: Gain 1 Faith Point.

name: Michelangelo Buonarroti
description:
Requirement: 10 stones 
Once Per Round ability: Receive 3 coins.

name: Ludovico III Gonzaga
description:
Requirement: 15 servants 
Once Per Round ability: Receive 1 Council Privilege.

name: Cosimo de' Medici
description:
Requirement: 2 Character Cards and 4 Building Cards 
Once Per Round ability: Receive 3 servants and gain 1 Victory Point.

name: Bartolomeo Colleoni
description:
Requirement: 2 Venture Cards and 4 Territory Cards 
Once Per Round ability: Gain 4 Victory Points.

name: Cesare Borgia
description:
Requirement: 3 Building Cards, 12 coins, and 2 Faith Points 
Permanent ability: You donâ€™t need to satisfy the Military Points requirement when 
you take Territory Cards.

name: Sigismondo Malatesta
description:
Requirement: 7 Military Points and 3 Faith Points 
Permanent ability: Your uncolored Family Member has a bonus of +3 on its value. 
(You can increase its value by spending servants or if you have Character Cards with 
this effect.)

name: Ludovico il Moro
description:
Requirement: 2 Territory Cards, 2 Character Cards, 2 Building Cards, and 2 Venture 
Cards Permanent ability: Your colored Family Members has a value of 5, regardless of 
their related dice. (You can increase their value by spending servants or if you have 
Character Cards with this effect.)

name: Lucrezia Borgia
description:
Requirement: 6 Development Cards of the same type 
Permanent ability: Your colored Family Members have a bonus of +2 on their 
value. (You can increase their value by spending servants or if you have Character 
Cards with this effect.)
